TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ComposablePart extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Defines the abstract base class for composable parts, which import objects and produce exported objects.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Activate() cil managed

Docs.summary: Called when all the imports of the part have been set, and exports can be retrieved.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Once this method is called, no further imports can be set unless a call is made to Deactivate.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of the objects that describe the exported objects provided by the part.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that describe the exported objects provided by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ExportDefinitions%2A>.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have exports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

Docs.exception: The object has been disposed of.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetExportedValue(class System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ExportDefinition definition) cil managed

Docs.param: One of the objects from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions%2A> property that describes the exported object to return.
Docs.summary: Gets the exported object described by the specified object.
Docs.exception: The object has been disposed of.
An error occurred getting the exported object described by the .
did not originate from the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart.ExportDefinitions%2A> property on the .
One or more prerequisite imports, indicated by <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition.IsPrerequisite%2A>, have not been set.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of the objects that describe the imported objects required by the part.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that describe the imported objects required by the .

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.ImportDefinitions%2A>.
Overrides of this property should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not have imports, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable%601> collection instead.

Docs.exception: The object has been disposed of.

Docs.summary: Gets the metadata of the object.
Docs.value: The metadata of the object. The default is an empty, read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object.

remarks.format:
## Remarks If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> object was created from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition> object, this property should return the result of <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePartDefinition.Metadata%2A>.
Overrides of this property should return a read-only <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> object with a case-sensitive, non-linguistic comparer, such as <xref:System.StringComparer.Ordinal%2A>, and should never return `null`. If the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ComposablePart> does not contain metadata, return an empty <xref:System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary%602> instead.

Docs.exception: The object has been disposed of.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract void SetImport (System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.ImportDefinition definition, System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable<System.ComponentModel.Composition.Primitives.Export> exports);

A collection of objects of which to set the import described by `definition`.
Docs.summary: Sets the import described by the specified object to be satisfied by the specified exports.
